name: StaphylococcusAureusTestsByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Staphylococcus Aureus (Tests by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Staphylococcus Aureus by culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Staphylococcus Aureus; positive blood culture or isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
